title: Ikea is the latest major retailer to bet on ‘buy now, pay later’
content:
Ikea wants to make it easier to buy inexpensive items on credit by jumping on the ‘buy now, pay later’ bandwagon. Is this actually good for consumers?

When you’re buying a pricey sofa or a kitchen cabinet set from Ikea, you can pay for it in installments. Now, you can also buy smaller items—like rugs and lamps—and pay for them later.
